channel.title: Gaining slayer lvls
channel.description:
ok i have a problem every time somsone gains a slayer lvl they log out..
ive changed slayer loads of times ive made is so that you train slayer when attacking a dummy you train slayer when killing some npcs you train slayer when finish a mini game use key on chest and u get xp even added genie lames to give slayer xp....
and no matter what i do when someone lvls a slayer lvl they log out.. and it's only for slayer... but if you have lvl 99 slayer and do any of those things i added and get xp it wont lag u out... it's only if your gaining a lvl...
any help fixing this plz?

item.title: Gaining slayer lvls
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

thank you very much… i no longer log out when lvling slayer =)
just when i lvl it shows im lvling theiving lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Gaining slayer lvls
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

     case 18: //Slayer
        //c.sendFrame164(12123);
        //c.sendFrame126("Congratulations "+c.playerName+", you just advanced a slayer level!", 6207);
       // c.sendFrame126("Your slayer level is now "+c.playerLevel[18]+" .", 6208);
       // c.sendMessage("Congratulations "+c.playerName+", you just advanced a slayer level.");

//c.NpcDialogueSend = true;
if (c.playerLevel[18] == 99) {
c.sendMessage(“Congratulations “+c.playerName+” on getting Level 99 Slayer!”);
c.addItem(14130, 1);
c.addItem(14131, 1);
c.addItem(14132, 1);
}
i Did That And It Worked, Mines In Handler… If Yours Isnt Then You Dont Need The c. Things
break;

Read full topic

ok i have a problem every time somsone gains a slayer lvl they log out…

you train slayer when attacking a dummy

you train slayer when finish a mini game use key on chest and u get xp
